EXISTING STRUCTURES
─────────────────────
### Extraction System at position (-3.5, 27.5)
Consists of:
• Extraction system burner inserter at (-3.5, 27.5) with a drop position of (-3.5, 28.5)
Use-case: Serves as the node for gathering and forwarding raw materials via a multi‐segment transport belt.

### Copper Cable Factory at position (2.5, 17.5)
Consists of:
• Cable factory input chest at (2.5, 17.5) that serves as the interface for receiving copper plates  
• Burner inserter at (3.5, 17.5) placed with direction RIGHT adjacent to the input chest  
• Burner inserter at (2.5, 16.5) (retrieved as the “new factory burner inserter”)  
• Burner inserter at (1.5, 17.5) that feeds into the production chain  
• Assembling machine at (1.5, 19.5) for converting inputs into copper cable  
Use-case: Processes and converts copper plates into copper cable via interconnected inserters, chest, and assembling machine.

### Isolated Belt Depot at position (3.5, 15.5)
Consists of:
• Wooden chest at (3.5, 15.5) placed as a depot target for item delivery  
• Transport belt segment at (4.5, 15.5) positioned adjacent to the depot chest for routing items  
• Depot burner inserter at (3.5, 14.5) (using direction UP) that transfers items from the depot  
Use-case: Provides an isolated belt target where the extraction system is meant to deliver resources through a multi‑segment transport belt.

ERROR TIPS
──────────
• Transport Belt Connection Errors  
  – When connecting belts, ensure the target entity is not of type SteamEngine. Use an intermediary inserter to input items instead of connecting directly.

• Entity Placement Distance Errors  
  – Verify that the player is within the maximum placement range (approximately 10 units) before attempting to place an entity.

• Undefined Variable Errors  
  – Ensure all variables (for example, target_chest) are defined and correctly named before use to prevent reference errors.

• Inventory Shortage Errors  
  – Check that the required items (e.g., wooden chest) are available in the inventory prior to placement.
